quote: Automatic medical image segmentation aims to expedite this diagnosis process.
Attention gates (AGs) adapted from [6] help the model focus on salient activations by prioritizing relevant regions.
Dice loss helps with the class imbalance problem when the foreground class is much smaller compared to the background class.
This shows that transforming images to appear under a uniform light source helps the model achieve better segmentation results.
The application of CC helps to reduce the reflectance in each image and improves performance even on low contrast images.
